name: Strange Way Home
description:
You drive Home after a long Day at Work - but something seems strange... The World and all Physics seem to break apart...

Drive from the Beginning till the End in just 3 Minutes, try it out, maybe You will like the Music, maybe You will the Scenery or both!

BIG Thanks to MOLUS for the Music and mr.RAM for the quick Blender Lessons!
Song is included in the Download-File ;) 

P.S. This Game is more an Art-Piece than a Game ;)

P.P.S This Game was made for the Kenny's Assets Jam! It was my first try at partaking in a Jam and I loved it :D! (Learned 3D in Godot and Blender just two days ago!)
